Description:
ResponsibilitiesConceptual Design: Collaborate with clients and project teams to develop innovative and creative architectural design concepts that meet the project requirements and align with the client's vision.
Technical Expertise: Apply your extensive knowledge and experience in architectural design principles, building codes, and regulations to ensure the feasibility and functionality of design concepts.
3D Modeling and Visualization: Utilize Rhino software to create detailed 3D models and visualizations that accurately represent design concepts, enabling effective communication with clients and stakeholders.
Revit Documentation: Develop comprehensive architectural drawings and documentation using Revit software, including plans, elevations, sections, and schedules.
Coordination and Collaboration: Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams, including engineers, interior designers, and contractors, to integrate design solutions and ensure the successful implementation of projects.
Client Interaction: Engage with clients to understand their design needs, present design proposals, and address any questions or concerns throughout the project lifecycle.
Project Management: Manage multiple design projects simultaneously, ensuring adherence to project timelines, budgets, and quality standards.
Research and Innovation: Stay updated on emerging design trends, technologies, and materials, and integrate them into the design process to enhance the quality and efficiency of projects.Rewards & BenefitsWe offer an excellent package which includes:A competitive salary

Skills:
Education: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Architecture from an accredited institution.
Experience: Minimum of 15 years of professional experience in architectural design, preferably with a focus on commercial, institutional, or residential projects.
Software Proficiency: Excellent knowledge and proficiency in Rhino and Revit software is essential. Familiarity with other design tools such as AutoCAD, SketchUp, and Adobe Creative Suite is a plus.
Design Skills: Strong design sensibility, with the ability to develop innovative and aesthetically pleasing architectural solutions that align with project goals and client requirements.
Technical Expertise: Thorough understanding of architectural design principles, building codes, regulations, and construction processes. Experience in sustainable design practices is desirable.
Communication and Presentation: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to effectively present and communicate design ideas to clients, stakeholders, and project teams.
Project Management: Demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, prioritize tasks, and meet project deadlines.
Collaboration: Proven experience collaborating with multidisciplinary teams and coordinating with various stakeholders to integrate design solutions effectively.
Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and address design challenges and propose innovative solutions.
Portfolio: A comprehensive portfolio showcasing your design skills, technical expertise, and experience in architectural design projects.
